message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value related to the increase in tax accrued but not yet paid from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see there's a line item labeled "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" which represents the change in taxes that have been accrued but not yet paid. This is exactly what the task is asking for.

The value for this line item is 253246.99, dated 2024-01-29.

Since this amount is positive, it represents an increase in tax payable (taxes accrued but not yet paid).

```json
{"solution": {'value': '253246.99'}}
```
